languages.text: {n}Маражай щелкает языком и отводит взгляд, моментально теряя интерес и к вам, и к Чорде, и, кажется, к происходящему на суде в целом.{/n}
{n}Marazhai clicks his tongue and looks away, immediately losing all interest in both you and Incendia, and in everything that is happening in her hall of justice, apparently.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай щелкает языком и отводит взгляд, моментально теряя интерес и к вам, и к Чорде, и, кажется, к происходящему на суде в целом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his tongue and looks away, immediately losing all interest in both you and Incendia — and the entirety of her hall of justice, apparently.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋啧了啧舌，转过了头，很显然，他立刻失去了兴趣。无论是你还是因森蒂娅，还是大厅发生的其他事情，都无法再引起他的注意。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his tongue and looks away, immediately losing all interest in both you and Incendia, and in everything that is happening in her hall of justice, apparently.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋啧了啧舌，转过了头，很显然，他立刻失去了兴趣。无论是你还是因森蒂娅，还是她的整个大厅，都无法再引起他的注意。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは舌打ちをし、視線を逸らす。あなたにもインセンディアにも、そして法廷で起きていることすべてにも、興味を失ってしまったようだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his tongue and looks away, immediately losing all interest in both you and Incendia, and in everything that is happening in her hall of justice, apparently.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは舌打ちをし、視線を逸らす。あなたにもインセンディアにも、そして法廷で起きていることすべてにも、興味を失ってしまったようだった。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai hace un chasquido con la lengua y mira hacia otro lado, perdiendo inmediatamente todo tipo de interés en ti, en Incendia y en todo lo que ocurre en la sala de justicia, aparentemente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his tongue and looks away, immediately losing all interest in both you and Incendia, and in everything that is happening in her hall of justice, apparently.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai hace un chasquido con la lengua y mira hacia otro lado, perdiendo inmediatamente todo tipo de interés en ti, en Incendia y en toda la sala de justicia.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai schnalzt mit der Zunge und blickt weg, er hat sofort jedes Interesse an dir und Incendia verloren ... und offenbar auch an allem, was in ihrer Halle der Gerechtigkeit geschieht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his tongue and looks away, immediately losing all interest in both you and Incendia, and in everything that is happening in her hall of justice, apparently.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai schnalzt mit der Zunge und blickt weg, er hat sofort jedes Interesse an dir und Incendia verloren ... und offenbar auch an ihrer gesamten Halle der Gerechtigkeit.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai fait claquer sa langue et détourne le regard, perdant subitement tout intérêt pour vous, Incendia et même l'ensemble de sa salle de justice.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his tongue and looks away, immediately losing all interest in both you and Incendia, and in everything that is happening in her hall of justice, apparently.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai fait claquer sa langue et détourne le regard, perdant subitement tout intérêt pour vous, Incendia et même l'ensemble de sa salle de justice.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, dilini şaklatıp başka tarafa bakıyor. Sana, İncendia'ya ve onun bu adalet salonunda olan biten her şeye karşı tüm ilgisini yitirmiş gibi duruyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his tongue and looks away, immediately losing all interest in both you and Incendia, and in everything that is happening in her hall of justice, apparently.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai dilini şaklatıyor ve başka tarafa doğru bakıyor. Sana, İncendia'ya ve de onun bu adalet salonunda olan biten her şeye karşı tüm ilgisini yitirmiş gibi duruyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
